bibl.idno: The Philip S. Hench Walter Reed/Yellow Fever Collection [manuscript] / [collected by] Philip S. Hench ; HEALTHSCI MS-1.

bibl.title: Letter fragment from Joseph A. LePrince to [Henry Rose Carter], [19--]

div1.p: LePrince discusses field work in Texas to control the outbreak of yellow fever.

div1.head: Letter fragment from Joseph A. LePrince to [Henry Rose Carter], [19--]
div1.opener:
ST. ANTHONY HOTEL
A. VALLS, PROP.
Laredo, Texas,____192_
3
div1.p:
I had written Robinsin in case
I needed him here- I send you
his letter-. Am writing Allen
tonight to write you re Robinsons
ability & experience-. I will not need
him if he is of use to you-

When I went to Tampico in
Sept & Returned in October they
were having plenty of Y. F at Tuxpam
which had direct communication
with Tampico - 12 hours travel-
Guiturez in his 1903 report showed
clearly it came by rail to Laredo
from Tampico- At that time I
recommended to the Bureau that
Laredo & Brownsvill should be
asked (I meant made) to eliminate
Stegomyia - & as a result I was assigned
Le Prince
Miss
4
St. ANTHONY HOTEL
A. VALLS, PROP.
Steg Control Yellow
Fever
Laredo & Brownsvill will
Laredo, Texas,____192_
Leprince
“to do the asking”-. The State Health
Officer came into it and some
“frijoles were spilled” but we have
managed to get both political
factions together & I think the
city will do & pay for its own work-
I leave for Brownsville on
May 18- Will spend a few days
there & get thing started - then
return here for a day or two & then
go on to Memphis- Im leaving
an inspector (Service Man) at each place
“El ojo del amo engorda el caballo”
If Brownsville & Laredo are
Relatively Stegomyia Free - even if
they add an R to mexican evolution
the border will be relatively
safe as say 90% of Traffic goes thru
ST. ANTHONY HOTEL
A. VALLS, PROP.
Laredo, Texas,____192_
5
those two places- We have a
mexican mayor here & Ive just
had a P. G. course in diplomacy
but won out- fortunately & the
town folks, press, commercial clubs
etc are enthusiastic for a mosquito
free town- Prizes have just been
awarded in schools for essays on
Stegomyia Control & Monevery Satur
day is “Mosquito day” here-.
for backyard containers-

I have arranged with Joe Corrigan
(directing preventive measures) at
Tuxpam, Tampico & Oil Fields to
keep (King U S P H S Quarantine Officer
at Laredo) & Creel advised as to
Steg Index (Tuxpam & Tampico)-

Less than one complete breeding
ST. ANTHONY HOTEL
A. VALLS, PROP.
Laredo, Texas,____192_
6
container (both Culex & Stegs) to each
400 houses-.

I figure that by giving 3 to 4 weeks
total for both Brownsville & Laredo
& getting them to do Steg work &
pay for it - that my time will
not be lost, altho there is not
as much need for it now as when
Tampico was infected-

They have just struck oil
30 miles from here & there are
signs of a boom-. I guage it
by hotel rates-

The gambusia in the Rio Grande
do not stay along shore nor in
shallows as much as in other places.
I slit one open yesterday - got 11
live babies out of it in a cup-
ST. ANTHONY HOTEL
A. VALLS, PROP.
Laredo, Texas,____192_
7
Put six baby larvae (tiny ones) in the cup
6 P. M yesterday & they were all
gone at 10 A M today- Premature
birth seemed to give a premature
appetite-.
div1.closer: sincerely yours J A LePrince-. Kindest regards to Miss Laura
